languages.english-overview:
Shadows Rising is a browser based RPG written in PHP, Javascript, and XHTML. MySQL/PostgreSQL supported. The core engine will allow users create unique RPGs by adding new items, classes, terrain maps to Game Modules.
Shadows Rising is released under the Affero GPL license.
languages.english-features: The core engine will allow users create unique RPGs by adding new items, classes, terrain maps to Game Modules
